mcq.statement: Which international decade, running from 2005 to 2014, was declared as the Second International Decade of the World's Indigenous People?

options.a: First International Decade of the World's Indigenous People
options.b: Second International Decade of the World's Indigenous People
options.c: Third International Decade of the World's Indigenous People

mcq.one_liner: The period from 2005 to 2014 was declared by the United Nations as the **Second International Decade of the World's Indigenous People**.
